languages.text: "Этот корабль стал целью атаки еретиков — значит, мое присутствие здесь и помощь тебе есть моя святая обязанность. Рано или поздно мне, вероятно, придется вернуться на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}, охранять его реликварий. Но я хотела бы пока остаться частью команды {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, если это всех устраивает".

traits.locale_text: "Этот корабль стал целью атаки пиратов-еретиков — значит, мое присутствие здесь и помощь тебе есть моя святая обязанность. Рано или поздно мне, вероятно, придется вернуться на Футфол, охранять его реликварий. Но я хотела бы пока остаться частью команды Вольного Торговца, если это всех устраивает".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "This ship was targeted by heretics — which means that my presence here and the assistance I provide to you are my sacred duty. Sooner or later I will likely have to return to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, to protect its reliquary. But for now I wish to remain a part of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s crew."
languages.original_text: "Этот корабль стал целью атаки еретиков — значит, мое присутствие здесь и помощь тебе есть моя святая обязанность. Рано или поздно мне, вероятно, придется вернуться на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}, охранять его реликварий. Но я хотела бы пока остаться частью команды {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, если это всех устраивает".

traits.locale_text: "This ship was targeted by pirate heretics — which means that my presence here and the assistance I provide to you are my sacred duty. Sooner or later I will likely have to go back to Footfall, to protect its reliquary. But for now I would like to remain a part of the Rogue Trader's crew, if that is to everyone's liking."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This ship was targeted by pirate heretics — which means that my presence here and the assistance I provide to you are my sacred duty. Sooner or later I will likely have to go back to Footfall, to protect its reliquary. But for now I would like to remain a part of the Rogue Trader's crew, if that is to everyone's liking."

But for now I wish to remain a part of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s crew."

traits.locale_text: "This ship was targeted by heretics — which means that my presence here and the assistance I provide to you are my sacred duty. Sooner or later I will likely have to return to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, to protect its reliquary. But for now I wish to remain a part of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s crew."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “一开始，是因为这艘船被异端分子盯上了。我必须留在这艘船上，为你提供帮助，这是我的神圣职责。当时，我认为我迟早会回到{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}，守护那里的圣骨匣。但现在，我希望能继续成为{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的船员。”
languages.original_text: "This ship was targeted by heretics — which means that my presence here and the assistance I provide to you are my sacred duty. Sooner or later I will likely have to return to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, to protect its reliquary. But for now I wish to remain a part of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s crew."

traits.locale_text: “一开始，是因为这艘船被邪恶的海盗盯上了。我必须留在这艘船上，为你提供帮助，这是我的神圣职责。当时，我认为我迟早会回到{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}，守护那里的圣骨匣。但现在，我希望能继续成为{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的船员。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "This ship was targeted by heretical pirates — which means that my presence here and the assistance I provide to you are my sacred duty. Sooner or later I will likely have to return to Footfall, to protect its reliquary. But for now I wish to remain a part of the Rogue Trader's crew."

languages.text: «Esta nave fue atacada por herejes, por lo que mi presencia a bordo y la ayuda que le proporciono son parte de mi deber sagrado. Tarde o temprano tendré que regresar a {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} para proteger su relicario, pero por el momento me gustaría seguir formando parte de la tripulación de{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}».
languages.original_text: "This ship was targeted by heretics — which means that my presence here and the assistance I provide to you are my sacred duty. Sooner or later I will likely have to return to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, to protect its reliquary. But for now I wish to remain a part of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s crew."

traits.locale_text: «Esta nave fue atacada por piratas herejes, por lo que mi presencia a bordo y la ayuda que le proporciono son parte de mi deber sagrado. Tarde o temprano tendré que regresar a {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} para proteger su relicario, pero por el momento me gustaría seguir formando parte de la tripulación de{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「この船は異端者たちに狙われている…これはすなわち、私がここにいること、そして私があなた達にもたらす援助は、私の神聖なる責務なのだ。遅かれ早かれ、聖遺物を守るために{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}に戻らなければならないだろう。だが今は、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の乗組員の一員であり続けたい」
languages.original_text: "This ship was targeted by heretics — which means that my presence here and the assistance I provide to you are my sacred duty. Sooner or later I will likely have to return to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, to protect its reliquary. But for now I wish to remain a part of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s crew."

traits.locale_text: 「この船は異端者たちに狙われている…これはすなわち、私がここにいること、そして私があなた達にもたらす援助は、私の神聖なる責務なのだ。遅かれ早かれ、聖遺物を守るために{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}に戻らなければならないだろう。だが今は、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の乗組員の一員であり続けたい」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Dieses Schiff wurde von Ketzern angegriffen. Und das macht meine Anwesenheit hier und meine Unterstützung Eurer Sache zu meiner heiligen Pflicht. Früher oder später werde ich wohl nach {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} zurückkehren müssen, um das Reliquiar dort zu beschützen. Doch vorerst möchte ich weiterhin meinen Beitrag als Teil der Crew {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}{/g} leisten."
languages.original_text: "This ship was targeted by heretics — which means that my presence here and the assistance I provide to you are my sacred duty. Sooner or later I will likely have to return to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, to protect its reliquary. But for now I wish to remain a part of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s crew."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Schiff wurde von ketzerischen Piraten angegriffen. Und das macht meine Anwesenheit hier und meine Unterstützung Eurer Sache zu meiner heiligen Pflicht. Früher oder später werde ich wohl nach {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} zurückkehren müssen, um das Reliquiar dort zu beschützen. Doch vorerst möchte ich weiterhin meinen Beitrag als Teil der Crew {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}{/g} leisten."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Ce vaisseau a été pris pour cible par des hérétiques, ce qui signifie que ma présence ici et l'aide que je vous fournis est en accord avec mon devoir sacré. Tôt ou tard, je devrai sans doute retourner à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, pour protéger son reliquaire. Mais en attendant, je souhaite rester dans l'équipage {mf|du|de la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "This ship was targeted by heretics — which means that my presence here and the assistance I provide to you are my sacred duty. Sooner or later I will likely have to return to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, to protect its reliquary. But for now I wish to remain a part of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s crew."

traits.locale_text: « Ce vaisseau a été pris pour cible par des pirates hérétiques, ce qui signifie que ma présence ici et l'aide que je vous fournis est en accord avec mon devoir sacré. Tôt ou tard, je devrai sans doute retourner à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, pour protéger son reliquaire. Mais en attendant, je souhaite rester dans l'équipage {mf|du|de la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Kâfirler, odağına bu gemiyi koydu. Yani burada bulunup sana yardımcı olmak artık benim kutlu vazifemdir. Eninde sonunda {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'daki{/g} kutsal emanet odasının başına dönmem gerekecek. Fakat şimdilik {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} mürettebatıyla kalmak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "This ship was targeted by heretics — which means that my presence here and the assistance I provide to you are my sacred duty. Sooner or later I will likely have to return to {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, to protect its reliquary. But for now I wish to remain a part of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s crew."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirler, odağına bu gemiyi koydu. Yani burada bulunup sana yardımcı olmak artık benim kutlu vazifemdir. Eninde sonunda {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'daki kutsal emanet odasının başına dönmem gerekecektir. Fakat şimdilik {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in mürettebatıyla kalmak isterim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
